trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示可讓 Windows Form 顯示在 [控制台] 中設定的文化特性的使用者介面執行緒陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Additional code is needed.
trans-unit.target: 需要額外的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 該屬性設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a culture name that cannot be used to locate a resource file.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設為無法用來尋找資源檔的文化特性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Resource filenames must include only letters, numbers, hyphens or underscores.
trans-unit.target: 資源檔名稱只可以包含字母、數字、連字號或底線。

trans-unit.source: Turns off automatic cleanup of runtime callable wrappers (RCW) for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 關閉目前執行緒之執行階段可呼叫包裝函式 (RCW) 的自動清除功能。

trans-unit.source: By default, the common language runtime (CLR) cleans up runtime callable wrappers automatically.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，common language runtime (CLR) 會清除執行階段可呼叫包裝函式自動。

trans-unit.source: The CLR pumps messages during the cleanup, which might cause reentrancy problems for a few applications that meet the following unusual criteria:
trans-unit.target: CLR 幫浦內訊息的清除，這可能會造成一些符合下列準則不尋常的應用程式的重新進入問題：

trans-unit.source: The application does its own message pumping.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式會自己訊息幫浦作業。

trans-unit.source: The application needs to control precisely when message pumping occurs.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式需要訊息幫浦作業發生時，精確地控制。

trans-unit.source: Such applications can use the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.DisableComObjectEagerCleanup%2A> method to prevent the CLR from doing automatic reclamation of runtime callable wrappers.
trans-unit.target: 這類應用程式可以使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.DisableComObjectEagerCleanup%2A>方法，以防止 CLR 做自動回收執行階段可呼叫包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: When this method has been called on a thread, automatic cleanup cannot be re-enabled for that thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果在執行緒上呼叫此方法，就無法重新啟用該執行緒自動清除。

trans-unit.source: When your application is ready to clean up runtime callable wrappers, use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.CleanupUnusedObjectsInCurrentContext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to instruct the runtime to clean up all runtime callable wrappers in the current context.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式準備好要清除執行階段可呼叫包裝函式時，請使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.CleanupUnusedObjectsInCurrentContext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以指示清除所有執行階段可呼叫包裝函式在目前內容中執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Message pumping occurs while the method executes.
trans-unit.target: 當方法執行時，就會發生訊息幫浦作業。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Notifies a host that execution is about to enter a region of code in which the effects of a thread abort or unhandled exception are limited to the current task.
trans-unit.target: 通知主機在即將執行的程式碼區域中，執行緒中止或未處理例外狀況影響的對象只限於目前的工作。

trans-unit.source: Hosts of the common language runtime (CLR), such as Microsoft SQL Server 2005, can establish different policies for failures in critical and non-critical regions of code.
trans-unit.target: 主控件，例如 Microsoft SQL Server 2005，common language runtime (CLR)，可以建立不同的原則中的程式碼的重大和非關鍵區域的失敗。

trans-unit.source: A critical region is one in which the effects of a thread abort or an unhandled exception might not be limited to the current task.
trans-unit.target: 在其中執行緒中止或未處理的例外狀況的影響可能不是目前的工作是關鍵區域。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, an abort or failure in a non-critical region of code affects only the task in which the error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，中止或非關鍵的程式碼區域中的失敗會影響只有工作發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a task that attempts to allocate memory while holding a lock.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設有嘗試配置記憶體時保留鎖定工作。

trans-unit.source: If the memory allocation fails, aborting the current task is not sufficient to ensure stability of the <xref:System.AppDomain>, because there can be other tasks in the domain waiting for the same lock.
trans-unit.target: 如果記憶體配置失敗，正在中止目前的工作並不足以確保穩定性<xref:System.AppDomain>，因為在等候相同的鎖定網域中可以有其他工作。

trans-unit.source: If the current task is terminated, other tasks could be deadlocked.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的工作已中止，其他工作可能發生死結。

trans-unit.source: When a failure occurs in a critical region, the host might decide to unload the entire <xref:System.AppDomain> rather than take the risk of continuing execution in a potentially unstable state.
trans-unit.target: 發生失敗時的關鍵區域中，主機可能會決定卸載整個<xref:System.AppDomain>而不需要繼續執行，可能會不穩定的狀態中的風險。

trans-unit.source: To inform the host that your code is entering a critical region, call <xref:System.Threading.Thread.BeginCriticalRegion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要通知您的程式碼正在進入關鍵區域的主機，呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.BeginCriticalRegion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Threading.Thread.EndCriticalRegion%2A> when execution returns to a non-critical region of code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.EndCriticalRegion%2A>當執行會傳回非關鍵的程式碼區域。

trans-unit.source: Using this method in code that runs under SQL Server 2005 requires the code to be run at the highest host protection level.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2005 底下執行的程式碼中使用這個方法需要最高的主機保護層級執行的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.BeginCriticalRegion%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.EndCriticalRegion%2A> methods to divide a block of code into critical and non-critical regions.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.BeginCriticalRegion%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.EndCriticalRegion%2A>分成重大和非重大地區的程式碼區塊的方法。

trans-unit.source: Notifies a host that managed code has finished executing instructions that depend on the identity of the current physical operating system thread.
trans-unit.target: 通知主機 Managed 程式碼已完成執行指令，而這些指令相依於目前實體作業系統執行緒的識別。

trans-unit.source: Some hosts of the common language runtime, such as Microsoft SQL Server 2005, provide their own thread management.
trans-unit.target: 某些主機的 common language runtime，例如 Microsoft SQL Server 2005，提供它們自己的執行緒管理。

trans-unit.source: A host that provides its own thread management can move an executing task from one physical operating system thread to another at any time.
trans-unit.target: 提供它自己的執行緒管理的主機執行的工作從一個實體作業系統執行緒之間移動在任何時間。

trans-unit.source: Most tasks are not affected by this switching.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的工作不會受到這個切換。

trans-unit.source: However, some tasks have thread affinity - that is, they depend on the identity of a physical operating system thread.
trans-unit.target: 不過，某些工作執行緒相似性，也就是相依實體作業系統執行緒的識別。

trans-unit.source: These tasks must inform the host when they execute code that should not be switched.
trans-unit.target: 這些工作必須通知主應用程式時執行程式碼，不會切換。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your application calls a system API to acquire an operating system lock that has thread affinity, such as a Win32 CRITICAL_SECTION, you must call <xref:System.Threading.Thread.BeginThreadAffinity%2A> before acquiring the lock, and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.EndThreadAffinity%2A> after releasing the lock.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的應用程式呼叫系統 API，以取得作業系統鎖定具有執行緒相似性，例如 Win32 CRITICAL_SECTION，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.BeginThreadAffinity%2A>之前取得鎖定，以及<xref:System.Threading.Thread.EndThreadAffinity%2A>之後釋放鎖定。

trans-unit.source: Using this method in code that runs under SQL Server 2005 requires the code to be run at the highest host protection level.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2005 底下執行的程式碼中使用這個方法需要最高的主機保護層級執行的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.BeginThreadAffinity%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.EndThreadAffinity%2A> methods to notify a host that a block of code depends on the identity of a physical operating system thread.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.BeginThreadAffinity%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.EndThreadAffinity%2A>方法，以通知主機一段程式碼相依於實體作業系統執行緒的識別。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Threading.ExecutionContext" /> object that contains information about the various contexts of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ExecutionContext" /> 物件，包含目前執行緒各種內容的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Threading.ExecutionContext" /> object that consolidates context information for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.ExecutionContext" /> 物件，合併目前執行緒的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext> class provides a single container for all information relevant to a logical thread of execution.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext>類別會提供所有的相關資訊的邏輯執行緒執行的單一容器。

trans-unit.source: This includes security context, call context, synchronization context, localization context, and transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 這包括安全性內容中，呼叫內容、 同步處理內容、 當地語系化內容和交易內容。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 確認釋出資源，並在記憶體回收行程再利用 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> 物件時執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Finalize%2A> when the current object is ready to be finalized.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Finalize%2A>準備最終處理而將目前的物件時。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data slot to be freed.
trans-unit.target: 要釋放之資料插槽的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Eliminates the association between a name and a slot, for all threads in the process.
trans-unit.target: 排除處理程序中所有執行緒的名稱和位置之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: For better performance, use fields that are marked with the <see cref="T:System.ThreadStaticAttribute" /> attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 為獲得較佳的效能，請改用以 <see cref="T:System.ThreadStaticAttribute" /> 屬性標示的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides two mechanisms for using thread local storage (TLS): thread-relative static fields (that is, fields that are marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute) and data slots.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供兩種機制使用執行緒區域儲存區 (TLS): 執行緒相關的靜態欄位 (也就是使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>屬性) 和資料位置。

trans-unit.source: Thread-relative static fields provide much better performance than data slots, and enable compile-time type checking.
trans-unit.target: 提供較佳的效能比資料的位置，並編譯時間類型檢查執行緒相關的靜態欄位。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using TLS, see [Thread Local Storage: Thread-Relative Static Fields and Data Slots](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用 TLS 的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行緒區域儲存區： 執行緒相關的靜態欄位和資料位置](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md)。

trans-unit.source: After any thread calls `FreeNamedDataSlot`, any other thread that calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetNamedDataSlot%2A> with the same name will allocate a new slot associated with the name.
trans-unit.target: 任何執行緒呼叫之後`FreeNamedDataSlot`，呼叫的其他任何執行緒<xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetNamedDataSlot%2A>相同的名稱就會配置新的位置與名稱相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to `GetNamedDataSlot` by any thread will return the new slot.
trans-unit.target: 後續呼叫`GetNamedDataSlot`任何執行緒會傳回新的位置。

trans-unit.source: However, any thread that still has a <xref:System.LocalDataStoreSlot?displayProperty=nameWithType> returned by an earlier call to `GetNamedDataSlot` can continue to use the old slot.
trans-unit.target: 不過，任何執行緒，仍有<xref:System.LocalDataStoreSlot?displayProperty=nameWithType>先前呼叫所傳回的`GetNamedDataSlot`可以繼續使用舊的位置。

trans-unit.source: A slot that has been associated with a name is released only when every `LocalDataStoreSlot` that was obtained prior to the call to `FreeNamedDataSlot` has been released and garbage-collected.
trans-unit.target: 釋放與名稱關聯的位置時，才每`LocalDataStoreSlot`之前呼叫取得`FreeNamedDataSlot`已釋放及回收。

trans-unit.source: Threads use a local store memory mechanism to store thread-specific data.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會使用本機存放區的記憶體機制，以儲存執行緒特定資料。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime allocates a multi-slot data store array to each process when it is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立時，common language runtime 會配置每個處理序的多位置資料存放區陣列。

trans-unit.source: The thread can allocate a data slot in the data store, store and retrieve a data value in the slot, and free the slot for reuse after the thread expires.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒用來配置資料存放區中的資料位置、 儲存和擷取資料值插槽中，並釋放以供重複使用的位置之後在執行緒逾時。

trans-unit.source: Data slots are unique per thread.
trans-unit.target: 資料位置是每個執行緒的唯一的。

trans-unit.source: No other thread (not even a child thread) can get that data.
trans-unit.target: 沒有其他執行緒 （甚至子執行緒） 可以取得該資料。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows how to use a field that is marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute to hold thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範如何使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>屬性，以儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows how to use a data slot to do the same thing.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例示範如何使用資料位置來執行相同的動作。

trans-unit.source: **First Example**
trans-unit.target: **第一個範例**

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a field that is marked with <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> to hold thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This technique provides better performance than the technique that is shown in the second example.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術提供更佳的效能比第二個範例所示的技巧。

trans-unit.source: **Second Example**
trans-unit.target: **第二個範例**

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a named data slot to store thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用具名的資料位置來儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Threading.ApartmentState" /> value indicating the apartment state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示 Apartment 狀態的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ApartmentState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ApartmentState" /> values indicating the apartment state of the managed thread.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ApartmentState" /> 值，表示 Managed 執行緒的 Apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Threading.ApartmentState.Unknown" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Threading.ApartmentState.Unknown" />。

trans-unit.source: This method, along with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A> method and the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> method, replaces the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法中，連同<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>方法和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法，會取代<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>，和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates a thread.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會建立執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Before the thread is started, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A> displays the initial <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.Unknown?displayProperty=nameWithType> state and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A> changes the state to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之前，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>顯示初始<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.Unknown?displayProperty=nameWithType>狀態和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>將狀態變更為<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> method then returns `false` when attempting to change the state to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType> because the apartment state is already set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法接著會傳回`false`嘗試將狀態變更時<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType>因為已設定 apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the same operation had been attempted with <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>, <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> would have been thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果相同的作業具有已嘗試使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就已擲回。

trans-unit.source: After the thread is started, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> method is used again.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之後，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法會再次使用。

trans-unit.source: This time it throws <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException> because the thread has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 這次會擲回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>因為執行緒已經啟動。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CompressedStack" /> object that can be used to capture the stack for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CompressedStack" /> 物件，可以用來擷取目前執行緒的堆疊。

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 無。

trans-unit.source: This method is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 不再支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.LocalDataStoreSlot" /> from which to get the value.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中取得值的 <see cref="T:System.LocalDataStoreSlot" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value from the specified slot on the current thread, within the current thread's current domain.
trans-unit.target: 從目前執行緒上、目前執行緒之目前定義域中的指定位置擷取數值。

trans-unit.source: For better performance, use fields that are marked with the <see cref="T:System.ThreadStaticAttribute" /> attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 為獲得較佳的效能，請改用以 <see cref="T:System.ThreadStaticAttribute" /> 屬性標示的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The retrieved value.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的數值。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides two mechanisms for using thread local storage (TLS): thread-relative static fields (that is, fields that are marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute) and data slots.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供兩種機制使用執行緒區域儲存區 (TLS): 執行緒相關的靜態欄位 (也就是使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>屬性) 和資料位置。

trans-unit.source: Thread-relative static fields provide much better performance than data slots, and enable compile-time type checking.
trans-unit.target: 提供較佳的效能比資料的位置，並編譯時間類型檢查執行緒相關的靜態欄位。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using TLS, see [Thread Local Storage: Thread-Relative Static Fields and Data Slots](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用 TLS 的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行緒區域儲存區： 執行緒相關的靜態欄位和資料位置](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md)。

trans-unit.source: Threads use a local store memory mechanism to store thread-specific data.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會使用本機存放區的記憶體機制，以儲存執行緒特定資料。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime allocates a multi-slot data store array to each process when it is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立時，common language runtime 會配置每個處理序的多位置資料存放區陣列。

trans-unit.source: The thread can allocate a data slot in the data store, store and retrieve a data value in the slot, and free the slot for reuse after the thread expires.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒用來配置資料存放區中的資料位置、 儲存和擷取資料值插槽中，並釋放以供重複使用的位置之後在執行緒逾時。

trans-unit.source: Data slots are unique per thread.
trans-unit.target: 資料位置是每個執行緒的唯一的。

trans-unit.source: No other thread (not even a child thread) can get that data.
trans-unit.target: 沒有其他執行緒 （甚至子執行緒） 可以取得該資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetData%2A> is a `Shared` method that always applies to the currently executing thread, even if you call it using a variable that refers to another thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetData%2A> 是`Shared`一律適用於目前執行中執行緒，即使您使用的變數，指的是另一個執行緒呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: To avoid confusion, use the class name when calling `Shared` methods: `Dim test As Object = Thread.GetData(testSlot)`.
trans-unit.target: 為了避免混淆，類別名稱呼叫時，使用`Shared`方法： `Dim test As Object = Thread.GetData(testSlot)`。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows how to use a field that is marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute to hold thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範如何使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>屬性，以儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows how to use a data slot to do the same thing.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例示範如何使用資料位置來執行相同的動作。

trans-unit.source: **First Example**
trans-unit.target: **第一個範例**

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a field that is marked with <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> to hold thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This technique provides better performance than the technique that is shown in the second example.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術提供更佳的效能比第二個範例所示的技巧。

trans-unit.source: **Second Example**
trans-unit.target: **第二個範例**

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a data slot to store thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用資料位置來儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current domain in which the current thread is running.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前執行緒正在其中執行的目前定義域。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> representing the current application domain of the running thread.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" />，代表執行中的執行緒目前的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to retrieve the name and ID of the `AppDomain` in which the thread is running.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取名稱和識別碼`AppDomain`中的執行緒執行。

trans-unit.source: Returns a unique application domain identifier.
trans-unit.target: 傳回唯一的應用程式定義域識別項。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer uniquely identifying the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 唯一識別應用程式定義域的 32 位元帶正負號的整數 (Signed Integer)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to retrieve the name and ID of the `AppDomain` in which the thread is running.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取名稱和識別碼`AppDomain`中的執行緒執行。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前執行緒的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: An integer hash code value.
trans-unit.target: 整數雜湊碼值。

trans-unit.source: The hash code is not guaranteed to be unique.
trans-unit.target: 不保證是唯一的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A> property if you need a unique identifier for a managed thread.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A>屬性，如果您需要 managed 執行緒的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the local data slot.
trans-unit.target: 本機資料位置的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Looks up a named data slot.
trans-unit.target: 尋找具名的資料位置。

trans-unit.source: For better performance, use fields that are marked with the <see cref="T:System.ThreadStaticAttribute" /> attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 為獲得較佳的效能，請改用以 <see cref="T:System.ThreadStaticAttribute" /> 屬性標示的欄位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.LocalDataStoreSlot" /> allocated for this thread.
trans-unit.target: 為這個執行緒配置的 <see cref="T:System.LocalDataStoreSlot" />。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides two mechanisms for using thread local storage (TLS): thread-relative static fields (that is, fields that are marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute) and data slots.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供兩種機制使用執行緒區域儲存區 (TLS): 執行緒相關的靜態欄位 (也就是使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>屬性) 和資料位置。

trans-unit.source: Thread-relative static fields provide much better performance than data slots, and enable compile-time type checking.
trans-unit.target: 提供較佳的效能比資料的位置，並編譯時間類型檢查執行緒相關的靜態欄位。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using TLS, see [Thread Local Storage: Thread-Relative Static Fields and Data Slots](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用 TLS 的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行緒區域儲存區： 執行緒相關的靜態欄位和資料位置](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md)。

trans-unit.source: Threads use a local store memory mechanism to store thread-specific data.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會使用本機存放區的記憶體機制，以儲存執行緒特定資料。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime allocates a multi-slot data store array to each process when it is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立時，common language runtime 會配置每個處理序的多位置資料存放區陣列。

trans-unit.source: The thread can allocate a data slot in the data store, store and retrieve a data value in the slot, and free the slot for reuse after the thread expires.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒用來配置資料存放區中的資料位置、 儲存和擷取資料值插槽中，並釋放以供重複使用的位置之後在執行緒逾時。

trans-unit.source: Data slots are unique per thread.
trans-unit.target: 資料位置是每個執行緒的唯一的。

trans-unit.source: No other thread (not even a child thread) can get that data.
trans-unit.target: 沒有其他執行緒 （甚至子執行緒） 可以取得該資料。

trans-unit.source: If the named slot does not exist, a new slot is allocated.
trans-unit.target: 如果具名的位置不存在，則會配置新的位置。

trans-unit.source: Named data slots are public and can be manipulated by anyone.
trans-unit.target: 具名的資料位置是公用的任何人都可以管理。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows how to use a field that is marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute to hold thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範如何使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>屬性，以儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows how to use a data slot to do the same thing.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例示範如何使用資料位置來執行相同的動作。

trans-unit.source: **First Example**
trans-unit.target: **第一個範例**

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a field that is marked with <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> to hold thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This technique provides better performance than the technique that is shown in the second example.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術提供更佳的效能比第二個範例所示的技巧。

trans-unit.source: **Second Example**
trans-unit.target: **第二個範例**

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a named data slot to store thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用具名的資料位置來儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Interrupts a thread that is in the <see langword="WaitSleepJoin" /> thread state.
trans-unit.target: 中斷處於 <see langword="WaitSleepJoin" /> 執行緒狀態的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: If this thread is not currently blocked in a wait, sleep, or join state, it will be interrupted when it next begins to block.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行緒目前未遭到封鎖在等候、 睡眠或聯結狀態，它將會中斷接下來開始封鎖時。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> is thrown in the interrupted thread, but not until the thread blocks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> 在中斷之執行緒，但直到則執行緒會封鎖，就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If the thread never blocks, the exception is never thrown, and thus the thread might complete without ever being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒永不封鎖，永遠不會擲回例外狀況，並因此執行緒可能會完成，而任何中斷。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the behavior of a running thread when it is interrupted and subsequently gets blocked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示執行中的執行緒行為時中斷，並接著已遭到封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有適當的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: for advanced operations on threads.
trans-unit.target: 進階的執行緒上作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlThread" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlThread" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the execution status of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前執行緒的執行狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this thread has been started and has not terminated normally or aborted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行緒已經啟動但還沒有正常結束或者中止，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not a thread is a background thread.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出執行緒是不是背景執行緒。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this thread is or is to become a background thread; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行緒是背景執行緒或者會成為背景執行緒，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A thread is either a background thread or a foreground thread.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒是背景執行緒或前景執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Background threads are identical to foreground threads, except that background threads do not prevent a process from terminating.
trans-unit.target: 背景執行緒就前景執行緒相同，不同之處在於背景執行緒不會防止處理序終止。

trans-unit.source: Once all foreground threads belonging to a process have terminated, the common language runtime ends the process.
trans-unit.target: 一旦處理程序所屬的所有前景執行緒已經都終止，common language runtime 會結束處理程序。

trans-unit.source: Any remaining background threads are stopped and do not complete.
trans-unit.target: 任何剩餘的背景執行緒已停止，並不會完成。

trans-unit.source: By default, the following threads execute in the foreground (that is, their <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsBackground%2A> property returns `false`):
trans-unit.target: 依預設，下列執行緒則是在前景執行 (也就是其<xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsBackground%2A>屬性會傳回`false`):

trans-unit.source: The primary thread (or main application thread).
trans-unit.target: 主執行緒 （或主應用程式執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: All threads created by calling a <xref:System.Threading.Thread> class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫建立的所有執行緒<xref:System.Threading.Thread>類別建構函式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the following threads execute in the background (that is, their <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsBackground%2A> property returns `true`):
trans-unit.target: 依預設，下列執行緒則是在背景中執行 (也就是其<xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsBackground%2A>屬性會傳回`true`):

trans-unit.source: Thread pool threads, which are a pool of worker threads maintained by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒集區執行緒，也就是由執行階段所維護的背景工作執行緒集區。

trans-unit.source: You can configure the thread pool and schedule work on thread pool threads by using the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用執行緒集區執行緒上設定執行緒集區和排程工作<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>類別。

trans-unit.source: Task-based asynchronous operations automatically execute on thread pool threads.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒集區執行緒上自動執行工作為基礎的非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: All threads that enter the managed execution environment from unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 從 unmanaged 程式碼進入 managed 的執行環境的所有執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The following example contrasts the behavior of foreground and background threads.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會比對前景和背景執行緒的行為。

trans-unit.source: It creates a foreground thread and a background thread.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立前景執行緒與背景執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The foreground thread keeps the process running until completes its `for` loop and terminates.
trans-unit.target: 前景執行緒會持續處理序執行，直到完成其`for`迴圈，並終止。

trans-unit.source: However, as the output from the example shows, because the foreground thread has finished execution, the process is terminated before the background thread has completed execution.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如範例輸出所示，因為前景執行緒已執行完畢，處理程序之前，終止背景執行緒完成執行。

trans-unit.source: The thread is dead.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒已無作用

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether or not a thread belongs to the managed thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出執行緒是否屬於 Managed 執行緒集區。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this thread belongs to the managed thread pool; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />，表示這個執行緒屬於 Managed 執行緒集區，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information see [The Managed Thread Pool](~/docs/standard/threading/the-managed-thread-pool.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Managed 執行緒集區](~/docs/standard/threading/the-managed-thread-pool.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to determine whether a thread is from the thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷執行緒是否是在執行緒集區。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the calling thread until the thread represented by this instance terminates.
trans-unit.target: 封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到此執行個體所代表的執行緒終止為止。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the calling thread until the thread represented by this instance terminates, while continuing to perform standard COM and <see langword="SendMessage" /> pumping.
trans-unit.target: 封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到此執行個體所代表的執行緒終止為止，但仍會繼續執行標準的 COM 與 <see langword="SendMessage" /> 提取作業。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> is a synchronization method that blocks the calling thread (that is, the thread that calls the method) until the thread whose <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> method is called has completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> 封鎖呼叫執行緒 （也就是呼叫方法的執行緒），直到執行緒的同步處理方法的<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>方法呼叫已完成。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to ensure that a thread has been terminated.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，以確保執行緒已終止。

trans-unit.source: The caller will block indefinitely if the thread does not terminate.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒不會終止，將會無限期地封鎖呼叫端。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `Thread1` thread calls the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join> method of `Thread2`, which causes `Thread1` to block until `Thread2` has completed.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，`Thread1`執行緒呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join>方法`Thread2`，這會導致`Thread1`區塊，直到`Thread2`已完成。

trans-unit.source: If the thread has already terminated when <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> is called, the method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒已經終止時有<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>呼叫時，此方法會立即傳回。

trans-unit.source: You should never call the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> method of the <xref:System.Threading.Thread> object that represents the current thread from the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 您應該永遠不會呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>方法<xref:System.Threading.Thread>物件，代表目前執行緒從目前的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This causes your app to hang because the current thread waits upon itself indefinitely,
trans-unit.target: 這會導致您的應用程式停止回應，因為目前的執行緒本身會永遠等候，

trans-unit.source: This method changes the state of the calling thread to include <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫的執行緒要包含的狀態變更<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot invoke `Join` on a thread that is in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted?displayProperty=nameWithType> state.
trans-unit.target: 無法叫用`Join`中的執行緒上<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted?displayProperty=nameWithType>狀態。

trans-unit.source: The caller attempted to join a thread that is in the <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端嘗試聯結處於 <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted" /> 狀態的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The thread is interrupted while waiting.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒在等待時中斷。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the thread to terminate.
trans-unit.target: 等候執行緒終止的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the calling thread until the thread represented by this instance terminates or the specified time elapses, while continuing to perform standard COM and SendMessage pumping.
trans-unit.target: 封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到此執行個體代表的執行緒終止或超過指定的時間為止，但仍繼續執行標準的 COM 與 SendMessage 提取作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the thread has terminated; <see langword="false" /> if the thread has not terminated after the amount of time specified by the <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> parameter has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒已經終止，為 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see langword="false" /> 參數指定的時間量已經過去，而執行緒還沒有終止，則為 <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%28System.Int32%29> is a synchronization method that blocks the calling thread (that is, the thread that calls the method) until either the thread whose <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> method is called has completed or the time-out interval has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%28System.Int32%29> 封鎖呼叫執行緒 （也就是呼叫方法的執行緒），直到其中一個執行緒的同步處理方法的<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>方法呼叫已完成或經過逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `Thread1` thread calls the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join> method of `Thread2`, which causes `Thread1` to block either until `Thread2` has completed or 2 seconds have elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，`Thread1`執行緒呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join>方法`Thread2`，這會導致`Thread1`封鎖直到 `Thread2`已完成或經過 2 秒。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType> is specified for the `millisecondsTimeout` parameter, this method behaves identically to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join> method overload, except for the return value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定`millisecondsTimeout`參數，此方法的行為即會相同與<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join>方法多載，除了傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: If the thread has already terminated when <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> is called, the method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒已經終止時有<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>呼叫時，此方法會立即傳回。

trans-unit.source: This method changes the state of the calling thread to include <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法呼叫的執行緒要包含的狀態變更<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot invoke `Join` on a thread that is in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted?displayProperty=nameWithType> state.
trans-unit.target: 無法叫用`Join`中的執行緒上<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted?displayProperty=nameWithType>狀態。

trans-unit.source: The value of <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> is negative and is not equal to <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecondsTimeout" /> 的值為負數，且不等於 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The thread has not been started.
trans-unit.target: 無法啟動此執行緒。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> set to the amount of time to wait for the thread to terminate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，設定為等候執行緒終止的時間量。

trans-unit.source: Blocks the calling thread until the thread represented by this instance terminates or the specified time elapses, while continuing to perform standard COM and SendMessage pumping.
trans-unit.target: 封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到此執行個體代表的執行緒終止或超過指定的時間為止，但仍繼續執行標準的 COM 與 SendMessage 提取作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the thread terminated; <see langword="false" /> if the thread has not terminated after the amount of time specified by the <paramref name="timeout" /> parameter has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒終止了，為 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see langword="false" /> 參數指定的時間量已經過去，而執行緒還沒有終止，則為 <paramref name="timeout" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%28System.TimeSpan%29> is a synchronization method that blocks the calling thread (that is, the thread that calls the method) until either the thread whose <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> method is called has completed or the time-out interval has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%28System.TimeSpan%29> 封鎖呼叫執行緒 （也就是呼叫方法的執行緒），直到其中一個執行緒的同步處理方法的<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>方法呼叫已完成或經過逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the `Thread1` thread calls the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join> method of `Thread2`, which causes `Thread1` to block either until `Thread2` has completed or 2 seconds have elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，`Thread1`執行緒呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join>方法`Thread2`，這會導致`Thread1`封鎖直到 `Thread2`已完成或經過 2 秒。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType> is specified for `timeout`, this method behaves identically to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join> method overload, except for the return value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定`timeout`，此方法的行為即會相同與<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join>方法多載，除了傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: If the thread has already terminated when <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> is called, the method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒已經終止時有<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>呼叫時，此方法會立即傳回。

trans-unit.source: This method changes the state of the current thread to include <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會變更目前的執行緒可包含的狀態<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot invoke `Join` on a thread that is in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted?displayProperty=nameWithType> state.
trans-unit.target: 無法叫用`Join`中的執行緒上<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted?displayProperty=nameWithType>狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a `TimeSpan` value with the `Join` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`TimeSpan`值與`Join`方法。

trans-unit.source: The value of <paramref name="timeout" /> is negative and is not equal to <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> in milliseconds, or is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 值 <paramref name="timeout" /> 為負數且不等於 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> 毫秒，或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The caller attempted to join a thread that is in the <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端嘗試聯結處於 <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Unstarted" /> 狀態的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique identifier for the current managed thread.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 Managed 執行緒的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents a unique identifier for this managed thread.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示這個 Managed 執行緒的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: A thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A> property value serves to uniquely identify that thread within its process.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒的<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A>屬性值是用來唯一識別其處理程序中的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A> property does not vary over time, even if unmanaged code that hosts the common language runtime implements the thread as a fiber.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A>屬性不會變化經過一段時間，即使裝載 common language runtime 的 unmanaged 程式碼實作在 fiber 的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes memory access as follows: The processor executing the current thread cannot reorder instructions in such a way that memory accesses prior to the call to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.MemoryBarrier" /> execute after memory accesses that follow the call to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.MemoryBarrier" />.
trans-unit.target: 同步處理記憶體存取，如下所示：執行目前執行緒的處理器無法以下列方式重新排列指示：呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.MemoryBarrier" /> 之前的記憶體存取在呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.MemoryBarrier" /> 後的記憶體存取之後執行。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.MemoryBarrier%2A> is required only on multiprocessor systems with weak memory ordering (for example, a system employing multiple Intel Itanium processors).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.MemoryBarrier%2A> 需要多處理器系統上僅使用弱式排序 （例如，採用多個將 Intel Itanium 處理器的系統） 的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: For most purposes, the C# `lock` statement, the Visual Basic `SyncLock` statement, or the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class provide easier ways to synchronize data.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的用途而言，C#`lock`陳述式，Visual Basic`SyncLock`陳述式，或<xref:System.Threading.Monitor>類別提供簡單的方式同步處理資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the thread.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定執行緒的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the thread, or <see langword="null" /> if no name was set.
trans-unit.target: 含有執行緒名稱的字串；如果沒有設定名稱，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is write-once.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是寫入-之後。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value of a thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Name%2A> property is `null`, you can determine whether a name has already been explicitly assigned to the thread by comparing it with `null`.
trans-unit.target: 因為執行緒的預設值<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Name%2A>屬性是`null`，您可以判斷是否已明確指派名稱給執行緒藉由比較它與`null`。

trans-unit.source: The string assigned to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Name%2A> property can include any Unicode character.
trans-unit.target: 指派給字串<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Name%2A>屬性可包含任何 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to name a thread.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何命名執行緒。

trans-unit.source: A set operation was requested, but the <see langword="Name" /> property has already been set.
trans-unit.target: 要求了一組作業，但是早已設定了 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the scheduling priority of a thread.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出執行緒的排程優先權。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPriority" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPriority" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadPriority.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadPriority.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: A thread can be assigned any one of the following priority <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPriority> values:
trans-unit.target: 下列優先順序的任何一個可以指派一個執行緒<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPriority>值：

trans-unit.source: Operating systems are not required to honor the priority of a thread.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不需要接受執行緒的優先權。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the result of changing the priority of a thread.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的結果變更執行緒的優先權。

trans-unit.source: Three threads are created, the priority of one thread is set to <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPriority.BelowNormal?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the priority of a second is set to <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPriority.AboveNormal?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 系統會建立三個執行緒，一個執行緒的優先權會設定為<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPriority.BelowNormal?displayProperty=nameWithType>，而第二個優先權會設定為<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPriority.AboveNormal?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Each thread increments a variable in a `while` loop and runs for a set time.
trans-unit.target: 每個執行緒遞增變數中的`while`迴圈和回合設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: The thread has reached a final state, such as <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Aborted" />.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒已達最後狀態，例如 <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Aborted" />。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPriority" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 為 Set 作業指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPriority" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Cancels an <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort(System.Object)" /> requested for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 取消為目前執行緒要求的 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can only be called by code with the proper permissions.
trans-unit.target: 只使用適當的權限的程式碼可以呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: When a call is made to `Abort` to terminate a thread, the system throws a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>.
trans-unit.target: 進行呼叫以`Abort`來終止執行緒，系統會擲回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>。

trans-unit.source: `ThreadAbortException` is a special exception that can be caught by application code, but is rethrown at the end of the catch block unless `ResetAbort` is called.
trans-unit.target: `ThreadAbortException` 是特殊的例外狀況，應用程式程式碼可以攔截但重新擲回的 catch 區塊的結尾除非`ResetAbort`呼叫。

trans-unit.source: `ResetAbort` cancels the request to abort, and prevents the `ThreadAbortException` from terminating the thread.
trans-unit.target: `ResetAbort` 取消要求中止，並防止`ThreadAbortException`終止執行緒。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> for an example that demonstrates calling the `ResetAbort` method.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>的範例，示範如何呼叫`ResetAbort`方法。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core only: This member is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 僅限 .NET Core：不支援此成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Abort" /> was not invoked on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Abort" /> 並未在目前執行緒上被叫用。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required security permission for the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有目前執行緒的必要安全性權限。

trans-unit.source: for advanced operations on threads.
trans-unit.target: 進階的執行緒上作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlThread" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlThread" />。

trans-unit.source: Resumes a thread that has been suspended.
trans-unit.target: 繼續已暫止的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Resume%2A> methods to synchronize the activities of threads.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Resume%2A>方法來同步處理執行緒活動。

trans-unit.source: You have no way of knowing what code a thread is executing when you suspend it.
trans-unit.target: 您有無從得知哪些程式碼的執行緒正在執行，當您暫停它。

trans-unit.source: If you suspend a thread while it holds locks during a security permission evaluation, other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> might be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 如果您暫停執行緒，而安全性權限評估期間保留鎖定，其他執行緒中<xref:System.AppDomain>可能封鎖。

trans-unit.source: If you suspend a thread while it is executing a class constructor, other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> that attempt to use that class are blocked.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別建構函式執行時，您可以暫停執行緒，其他執行緒中<xref:System.AppDomain>，嘗試使用封鎖的類別。

trans-unit.source: Deadlocks can occur very easily.
trans-unit.target: 很容易發生死結。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core only: This member is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 僅限 .NET Core：不支援此成員。

trans-unit.source: The thread has not been started, is dead, or is not in the suspended state.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒未啟動、已無作用，或不是處於暫停狀態。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the appropriate <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有適當的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: for advanced operations on threads.
trans-unit.target: 進階的執行緒上作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlThread" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlThread" />

trans-unit.source: The new apartment state.
trans-unit.target: 新的 Apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: Sets the apartment state of a thread before it is started.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之前設定其 Apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: New threads are initialized as <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType> if their apartment state has not been set before they are started.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行緒都會初始化成<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果會在啟動之前不已設定其 apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: Apartment state must be set before a thread is started.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之前，必須設定 apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: The main application thread is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType> by default.
trans-unit.target: 主應用程式執行緒會初始化為<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType>預設。

trans-unit.source: The only way to set the apartment state of the main application thread to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType> is to apply the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute to the entry point method.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定主應用程式執行緒的 apartment 狀態的唯一方式<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType>是套用<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性設定為進入點方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A> method, along with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A> method and the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> method, replaces the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>方法，連同<xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>方法和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法，會取代<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>，和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates a thread.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會建立執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Before the thread is started, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A> displays the initial <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.Unknown?displayProperty=nameWithType> state and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A> changes the state to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之前，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>顯示初始<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.Unknown?displayProperty=nameWithType>狀態和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>將狀態變更為<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> method then returns `false` when attempting to change the state to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType> because the apartment state is already set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法接著會傳回`false`嘗試將狀態變更時<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType>因為已設定 apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the same operation had been attempted with <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>, <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> would have been thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果相同的作業具有已嘗試使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就已擲回。

trans-unit.source: After the thread is started, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> method is used again.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之後，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法會再次使用。

trans-unit.source: This time it throws <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException> because the thread has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 這次會擲回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>因為執行緒已經啟動。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core only: This member is not supported on the macOS and Linux platforms.
trans-unit.target: 僅限 .NET Core：macOS 和 Linux 平台不支援此成員。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is not a valid apartment state.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 不是有效的 Apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: The thread has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 已經啟動執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The apartment state has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Apartment 狀態已經初始化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.CompressedStack" /> object to be applied to the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CompressedStack" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Applies a captured <see cref="T:System.Threading.CompressedStack" /> to the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 將擷取的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.CompressedStack" /> 套用到目前的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This method is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 不再支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.LocalDataStoreSlot" /> in which to set the value.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中設定數值的 <see cref="T:System.LocalDataStoreSlot" />。

trans-unit.source: The value to be set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the data in the specified slot on the currently running thread, for that thread's current domain.
trans-unit.target: 針對那個執行緒目前的定義域，在目前執行之執行緒上的指定位置中設定資料。

trans-unit.source: For better performance, use fields marked with the <see cref="T:System.ThreadStaticAttribute" /> attribute instead.
trans-unit.target: 為獲得較佳的效能，請改用以 <see cref="T:System.ThreadStaticAttribute" /> 屬性標示的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides two mechanisms for using thread local storage (TLS): thread-relative static fields (that is, fields that are marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute) and data slots.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供兩種機制使用執行緒區域儲存區 (TLS): 執行緒相關的靜態欄位 (也就是使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>屬性) 和資料位置。

trans-unit.source: Thread-relative static fields provide much better performance than data slots, and enable compile-time type checking.
trans-unit.target: 提供較佳的效能比資料的位置，並編譯時間類型檢查執行緒相關的靜態欄位。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using TLS, see [Thread Local Storage: Thread-Relative Static Fields and Data Slots](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用 TLS 的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行緒區域儲存區： 執行緒相關的靜態欄位和資料位置](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md)。

trans-unit.source: Threads use a local store memory mechanism to store thread-specific data.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會使用本機存放區的記憶體機制，以儲存執行緒特定資料。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime allocates a multi-slot data store array to each process when it is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立時，common language runtime 會配置每個處理序的多位置資料存放區陣列。

trans-unit.source: The thread can allocate a data slot in the data store, store and retrieve a data value in the slot, and free the slot for reuse after the thread procedure ends and the <xref:System.Threading.Thread> object has been reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒用來配置資料存放區中的資料位置，儲存和擷取資料值插槽中並在執行緒程序結束之後釋放重複使用的位置和<xref:System.Threading.Thread>已經由記憶體回收回收物件。

trans-unit.source: Data slots are unique per thread.
trans-unit.target: 資料位置是每個執行緒的唯一的。

trans-unit.source: No other thread (not even a child thread) can get that data.
trans-unit.target: 沒有其他執行緒 （甚至子執行緒） 可以取得該資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetData%2A> is a `Shared` method that always applies to the currently executing thread, even if you call it using a variable that refers to another thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetData%2A> 是`Shared`一律適用於目前執行中執行緒，即使您使用的變數，指的是另一個執行緒呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: To avoid confusion, use the class name when calling `Shared` methods: `Thread.SetData(testSlot, "test data")`.
trans-unit.target: 為了避免混淆，類別名稱呼叫時，使用`Shared`方法： `Thread.SetData(testSlot, "test data")`。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows how to use a field that is marked with the <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> attribute to hold thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範如何使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>屬性，以儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows how to use a data slot to do the same thing.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例示範如何使用資料位置來執行相同的動作。

trans-unit.source: **First Example**
trans-unit.target: **第一個範例**

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a field that is marked with <xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute> to hold thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用標示的欄位<xref:System.ThreadStaticAttribute>儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This technique provides better performance than the technique that is shown in the second example.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術提供更佳的效能比第二個範例所示的技巧。

trans-unit.source: **Second Example**
trans-unit.target: **第二個範例**

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a named data slot to store thread-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用具名的資料位置來儲存執行緒特定的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Suspends the current thread for the specified amount of time.
trans-unit.target: 在指定長度的時間內暫止目前的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds for which the thread is suspended.
trans-unit.target: 暫止執行緒的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <c>millisecondsTimeout</c> argument is zero, the thread relinquishes the remainder of its time slice to any thread of equal priority that is ready to run.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>millisecondsTimeout</c> 引數的值為零，則執行緒會將其剩餘的時間配量讓與準備好要執行的任何同等優先權執行緒。

trans-unit.source: If there are no other threads of equal priority that are ready to run, execution of the current thread is not suspended.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有其他準備好要執行的同等優先權執行緒，則目前執行緒的執行不會暫停。

trans-unit.source: Suspends the current thread for the specified number of milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的毫秒數內暫止目前的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The thread will not be scheduled for execution by the operating system for the amount of time specified.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒不會執行由作業系統在指定的時間排程。

trans-unit.source: This method changes the state of the thread to include <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會包含執行緒的狀態變更<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>。

trans-unit.source: You can specify <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the `millisecondsTimeout` parameter to suspend the thread indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`millisecondsTimeout`無限期地暫止執行緒的參數。

trans-unit.source: However, we recommend that you use other <xref:System.Threading?displayProperty=nameWithType> classes such as <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>, <xref:System.Threading.Monitor>, <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>, or <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> instead to sychronize threads or manage resources.
trans-unit.target: 不過，我們建議您使用其他<xref:System.Threading?displayProperty=nameWithType>之類的類別<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>， <xref:System.Threading.Monitor>， <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>，或<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>改為還執行緒或管理資源。

trans-unit.source: The system clock ticks at a specific rate called the clock resolution.
trans-unit.target: 在特定速率的系統時鐘刻度呼叫時鐘的解析度。

trans-unit.source: The actual timeout might not be exactly the specified timeout, because the specified timeout will be adjusted to coincide with clock ticks.
trans-unit.target: 實際逾時可能不完全指定的逾時，因為指定的逾時將會調整，讓時鐘刻度一致。

trans-unit.source: For more information on clock resolution and the waiting time, see the [Sleep function](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms686298.aspx) topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關時鐘的解析度和等候時間的詳細資訊，請參閱[睡眠函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms686298.aspx)主題。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the [Sleep function](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms686298.aspx) from the Windows system APIs.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫[睡眠函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms686298.aspx)Windows 系統應用程式開發介面。

trans-unit.source: This method does not perform standard COM and SendMessage pumping.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會執行標準的 COM 與 SendMessage 幫浦作業。

trans-unit.source: If you need to sleep on a thread that has <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>, but you want to perform standard COM and SendMessage pumping, consider using one of the overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> method that specifies a timeout interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要進入睡眠狀態已在執行緒上<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>，但您想要執行標準的 COM 與 SendMessage 幫浦作業，請考慮使用其中一個多載的<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>方法所指定的逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A> method to block the application's main thread.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A>方法來封鎖，應用程式的主執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The time-out value is negative and is not equal to <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />.
trans-unit.target: 逾時值為負且不等於 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" />。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time for which the thread is suspended.
trans-unit.target: 暫止執行緒的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <c>millisecondsTimeout</c> argument is <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />, the thread relinquishes the remainder of its time slice to any thread of equal priority that is ready to run.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>millisecondsTimeout</c> 引數的值為 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />，則執行緒會將其剩餘的時間配量讓與準備好要執行的任何同等優先權執行緒。

trans-unit.source: If there are no other threads of equal priority that are ready to run, execution of the current thread is not suspended.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有其他準備好要執行的同等優先權執行緒，則目前執行緒的執行不會暫停。

trans-unit.source: Suspends the current thread for the specified amount of time.
trans-unit.target: 在指定長度的時間內暫止目前的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The thread will not be scheduled for execution by the operating system for the amount of time specified.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒不會執行由作業系統在指定的時間排程。

trans-unit.source: This method changes the state of the thread to include <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會包含執行緒的狀態變更<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>。

trans-unit.source: You can specify <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the `timeout` parameter to suspend the thread indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`timeout`無限期地暫止執行緒的參數。

trans-unit.source: However, we recommend that you use other <xref:System.Threading?displayProperty=nameWithType> classes such as <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>, <xref:System.Threading.Monitor>, <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>, or <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore> instead to sychronize threads or manage resources.
trans-unit.target: 不過，我們建議您使用其他<xref:System.Threading?displayProperty=nameWithType>之類的類別<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>， <xref:System.Threading.Monitor>， <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>，或<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>改為還執行緒或管理資源。

trans-unit.source: This overload of <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A> uses the total number of whole milliseconds in `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A>使用中的整數毫秒總數`timeout`。

trans-unit.source: Fractional milliseconds are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 小數的毫秒都會被捨棄。

trans-unit.source: This method does not perform standard COM and SendMessage pumping.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會執行標準的 COM 與 SendMessage 幫浦作業。

trans-unit.source: If you need to sleep on a thread that has <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>, but you want to perform standard COM and SendMessage pumping, consider using one of the overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A> method that specifies a timeout interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要進入睡眠狀態已在執行緒上<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>，但您想要執行標準的 COM 與 SendMessage 幫浦作業，請考慮使用其中一個多載的<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Join%2A>方法所指定的逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%28System.TimeSpan%29> method overload to block the application's main thread five times, for two seconds each time.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%28System.TimeSpan%29>方法多載來封鎖應用程式的主執行緒五次，兩秒鐘每一次。

trans-unit.source: The value of <paramref name="timeout" /> is negative and is not equal to <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> in milliseconds, or is greater than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 值 <paramref name="timeout" /> 為負數且不等於 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite" /> 毫秒，或大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that defines how long a thread is to wait.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，定義執行緒要等候多久。

trans-unit.source: Causes a thread to wait the number of times defined by the <paramref name="iterations" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 造成執行緒等候 <paramref name="iterations" /> 參數定義的次數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A> method is useful for implementing locks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A>方法可用於實作鎖定。

trans-unit.source: Classes in the .NET Framework, such as <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> and <xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock>, use this method internally.
trans-unit.target: 類別在.NET Framework 中，例如<xref:System.Threading.Monitor>和<xref:System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock>，這個方法會在內部使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A> essentially puts the processor into a very tight loop, with the loop count specified by the `iterations` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A> 基本上放處理器非常緊密迴圈中，與所指定的迴圈計數`iterations`參數。

trans-unit.source: The duration of the wait therefore depends on the speed of the processor.
trans-unit.target: 等候的持續時間因此取決於處理器的速度。

trans-unit.source: Contrast this with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A thread that calls <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A> yields the rest of its current slice of processor time, even if the specified interval is zero.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的執行緒<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A>會產生其目前的配量的處理器時間的其餘部分，即使指定的時間間隔為零。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a non-zero interval for <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A> removes the thread from consideration by the thread scheduler until the time interval has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: 指定非零間隔<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Sleep%2A>經過的時間間隔之前執行緒移除執行緒排程器的考量。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A> is not generally useful for ordinary applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A> 不通常適用於一般的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you should use the synchronization classes provided by the .NET Framework; for example, call <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Enter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or a statement that wraps <xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Enter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> (`lock` in C# or `SyncLock` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，您應該使用.NET Framework; 所提供的同步處理類別例如，呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Enter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或陳述式包裝<xref:System.Threading.Monitor.Enter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>(`lock`在 C# 或`SyncLock`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: In the rare case where it is advantageous to avoid a context switch, such as when you know that a state change is imminent, make a call to the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A> method in your loop.
trans-unit.target: 在極少數的案例是幫助避免將內容切換，例如當您知道狀態變更已即將發生，請呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A>在迴圈中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The code <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A> executes is designed to prevent problems that can occur on computers with multiple processors.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A>執行為了防止具有多個處理器的電腦上可能發生的問題。

trans-unit.source: For example, on computers with multiple Intel processors employing Hyper-Threading technology, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A> prevents processor starvation in certain situations.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在多個採用超執行緒技術的 Intel 處理器的電腦上<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SpinWait%2A>可防止在某些情況下的處理器資源用盡。

trans-unit.source: Causes a thread to be scheduled for execution.
trans-unit.target: 使執行緒進行執行排程。

trans-unit.source: Causes the operating system to change the state of the current instance to <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Running" />.
trans-unit.target: 造成作業系統將目前執行個體的狀態變更為 <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Running" />。

trans-unit.source: Once a thread is in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Running?displayProperty=nameWithType> state, the operating system can schedule it for execution.
trans-unit.target: 一旦執行緒處於<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Running?displayProperty=nameWithType>狀態時，系統可以將它排程執行。

trans-unit.source: The thread begins executing at the first line of the method represented by the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> or <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate supplied to the thread constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒開始執行所表示之方法的第一行<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>或<xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>委派提供給執行緒的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Note that the call to <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A> does not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: If this overload is used with a thread created using a <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate, `null` is passed to the method executed by the thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載會搭配使用所建立的執行緒<xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>委派，`null`傳遞至由執行緒執行的方法。

trans-unit.source: Once the thread terminates, it cannot be restarted with another call to `Start`.
trans-unit.target: 一旦在執行緒結束，無法將它重新啟動與另一個呼叫`Start`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates and starts a thread.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立並啟動執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The thread has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 已經啟動執行緒。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory available to start this thread.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠的記憶體可用來啟動這個執行緒。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains data to be used by the method the thread executes.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含執行緒執行之方法所要使用的資料。

trans-unit.source: Causes the operating system to change the state of the current instance to <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Running" />, and optionally supplies an object containing data to be used by the method the thread executes.
trans-unit.target: 使作業系統將目前執行個體的狀態改成 <see cref="F:System.Threading.ThreadState.Running" />，並選擇性地提供物件，在物件中包含執行緒執行之方法所要使用的資料。

trans-unit.source: Once a thread is in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Running?displayProperty=nameWithType> state, the operating system can schedule it for execution.
trans-unit.target: 一旦執行緒處於<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.Running?displayProperty=nameWithType>狀態時，系統可以將它排程執行。

trans-unit.source: The thread begins executing at the first line of the method represented by the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart> or <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate supplied to the thread constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒開始執行所表示之方法的第一行<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStart>或<xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>委派提供給執行緒的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Note that the call to <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A> does not block the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Start%2A>不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Once the thread terminates, it cannot be restarted with another call to `Start`.
trans-unit.target: 一旦在執行緒結束，無法將它重新啟動與另一個呼叫`Start`。

trans-unit.source: This overload and the <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate make it easy to pass data to a thread procedure, but the technique is not type safe because any object can be passed to this overload.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載而<xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>委派即可輕易地將資料傳遞給執行緒的程序，但方法不是類型安全因為任何物件可以傳遞給這個多載。

trans-unit.source: A more robust way to pass data to a thread procedure is to put both the thread procedure and the data fields into a worker object.
trans-unit.target: 將執行緒的程序與資料欄位放入背景工作物件是更穩固的方式，將資料傳遞給執行緒的程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Creating Threads and Passing Data at Start Time](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[建立執行緒和開始時間傳遞資料](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart> delegate with a static method and an instance method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart>具有靜態方法和執行個體方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: The thread has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 已經啟動執行緒。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory available to start this thread.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠的記憶體可用來啟動這個執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This thread was created using a <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadStart" /> delegate instead of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行緒是使用 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadStart" /> 委派建立，而非 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Either suspends the thread, or if the thread is already suspended, has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 將執行緒暫止；或者如果執行緒已經暫止，則沒有影響。

trans-unit.source: If the thread is already suspended, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒已經暫止，這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Resume%2A> methods to synchronize the activities of threads.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Suspend%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Resume%2A>方法來同步處理執行緒活動。

trans-unit.source: You have no way of knowing what code a thread is executing when you suspend it.
trans-unit.target: 您有無從得知哪些程式碼的執行緒正在執行，當您暫停它。

trans-unit.source: If you suspend a thread while it holds locks during a security permission evaluation, other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> might be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 如果您暫停執行緒，而安全性權限評估期間保留鎖定，其他執行緒中<xref:System.AppDomain>可能封鎖。

trans-unit.source: If you suspend a thread while it is executing a class constructor, other threads in the <xref:System.AppDomain> that attempt to use that class are blocked.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別建構函式執行時，您可以暫停執行緒，其他執行緒中<xref:System.AppDomain>，嘗試使用封鎖的類別。

trans-unit.source: Deadlocks can occur very easily.
trans-unit.target: 很容易發生死結。

trans-unit.target: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。
