trans-unit.target: 結構的指標，此結構包含引數陣列、指名引數之 DISPID 引數的陣列，以及陣列中項目數目的計數。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向用於儲存結果之位置的指標。

trans-unit.target: 包含例外狀況資訊的結構指標。

trans-unit.target: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value containing the states of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 取得數值，包含目前執行緒的狀態。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadState" /> values indicating the state of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadState" /> 數值，指出目前執行緒的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The initial value is <see langword="Unstarted" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始值為 <see langword="Unstarted" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ThreadState%2A> property provides more specific information than the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ThreadState%2A>屬性會提供更具體的資訊比<xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Thread state is only of interest in debugging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒狀態只是想要偵錯案例。

trans-unit.source: Your code should never use thread state to synchronize the activities of threads.
trans-unit.target: 您的程式碼絕對不應該使用執行緒狀態來同步處理執行緒活動。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates accessing the `ThreadState` of a thread.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何存取`ThreadState`的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The new apartment state.
trans-unit.target: 新的 Apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: Sets the apartment state of a thread before it is started.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之前設定其 Apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the apartment state is set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已設定 Apartment 狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: New threads are initialized as <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType> if their apartment state has not been set before they are started.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行緒都會初始化成<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果會在啟動之前不已設定其 apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: Apartment state must be set before a thread is started.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之前，必須設定 apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: The main application thread is initialized to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType> by default.
trans-unit.target: 主應用程式執行緒會初始化為<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType>預設。

trans-unit.source: The only way to set the apartment state of the main application thread to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType> is to apply the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute to the entry point method.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定主應用程式執行緒的 apartment 狀態的唯一方式<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType>是套用<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性設定為進入點方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> method, along with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A> method and the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A> method, replaces the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法，連同<xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>方法和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>方法，會取代<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ApartmentState%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>，和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code example creates a thread.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會建立執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Before the thread is started, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A> displays the initial <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.Unknown?displayProperty=nameWithType> state and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A> changes the state to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之前，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.GetApartmentState%2A>顯示初始<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.Unknown?displayProperty=nameWithType>狀態和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>將狀態變更為<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.STA?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> method then returns `false` when attempting to change the state to <xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType> because the apartment state is already set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法接著會傳回`false`嘗試將狀態變更時<xref:System.Threading.ApartmentState.MTA?displayProperty=nameWithType>因為已設定 apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the same operation had been attempted with <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>, <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> would have been thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果相同的作業具有已嘗試使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A>，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就已擲回。

trans-unit.source: After the thread is started, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A> method is used again.
trans-unit.target: 在執行緒啟動之後，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A>方法會再次使用。

trans-unit.source: This time it throws <xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException> because the thread has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 這次會擲回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadStateException>因為執行緒已經啟動。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is not a valid apartment state.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 不是有效的 Apartment 狀態。

trans-unit.source: The thread has already been started.
trans-unit.target: 已經啟動執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: 讀取欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The value is the latest written by any processor in a computer, regardless of the number of processors or the state of processor cache.
trans-unit.target: 值是由電腦中的任意處理器最新寫入的，與處理器的數目或處理器快取的狀態無關。

trans-unit.source: The field to be read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: 讀取欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The value is the latest written by any processor in a computer, regardless of the number of processors or the state of processor cache.
trans-unit.target: 值是由電腦中的任意處理器最新寫入的，與處理器的數目或處理器快取的狀態無關。

trans-unit.source: The latest value written to the field by any processor.
trans-unit.target: 由任意處理器寫入欄位的最新值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> are for special cases of synchronization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> 和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>會同步處理的特殊案例。

trans-unit.source: Under normal circumstances, the C# `lock` statement, the Visual Basic `SyncLock` statement, and the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class provide easier alternatives.
trans-unit.target: 在一般情況下，C#`lock`陳述式，Visual Basic`SyncLock`陳述式，而<xref:System.Threading.Monitor>類別提供您更輕鬆的替代項目。

trans-unit.source: On a multiprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> obtains the very latest value written to a memory location by any processor.
trans-unit.target: 在多處理器系統上，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>取得最新的值由任意處理器寫入記憶體位置。

trans-unit.source: This might require flushing processor caches.
trans-unit.target: 這可能需要清除處理器快取。

trans-unit.source: Even on a uniprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> ensure that a value is read or written to memory, and not cached (for example, in a processor register).
trans-unit.target: 在單一處理器系統上，甚至<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>確保某值為讀取或寫入記憶體，並不會快取 （例如，在處理器暫存器）。

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can use them to synchronize access to a field that can be updated by another thread, or by hardware.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以使用它們來進行同步存取另一個執行緒，或硬體可更新的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method affects only a single memory access.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法只會影響單一記憶體存取。

trans-unit.source: To provide effective synchronization for a field, all access to the field must use <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供有效欄位的同步處理，必須使用欄位的所有存取<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In C#, using the `volatile` modifier on a field guarantees that all access to that field uses <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，使用`volatile`欄位修飾詞可確保所有存取該欄位會都使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The field to be read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: 讀取欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The value is the latest written by any processor in a computer, regardless of the number of processors or the state of processor cache.
trans-unit.target: 值是由電腦中的任意處理器最新寫入的，與處理器的數目或處理器快取的狀態無關。

trans-unit.source: Even on a uniprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> ensure that a value is read or written to memory, and not cached (for example, in a processor register).
trans-unit.target: 在單一處理器系統上，甚至<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>確保某值為讀取或寫入記憶體，並不會快取 （例如，在處理器暫存器）。

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can use them to synchronize access to a field that can be updated by another thread, or by hardware.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以使用它們來進行同步存取另一個執行緒，或硬體可更新的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method affects only a single memory access.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法只會影響單一記憶體存取。

trans-unit.source: To provide effective synchronization for a field, all access to the field must use <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供有效欄位的同步處理，必須使用欄位的所有存取<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In C#, using the `volatile` modifier on a field guarantees that all access to that field uses <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，使用`volatile`欄位修飾詞可確保所有存取該欄位會都使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The field to be read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: 讀取欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The value is the latest written by any processor in a computer, regardless of the number of processors or the state of processor cache.
trans-unit.target: 值是由電腦中的任意處理器最新寫入的，與處理器的數目或處理器快取的狀態無關。

trans-unit.source: The latest value written to the field by any processor.
trans-unit.target: 由任意處理器寫入欄位的最新值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> are for special cases of synchronization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> 和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>會同步處理的特殊案例。

trans-unit.source: Under normal circumstances, the C# `lock` statement, the Visual Basic `SyncLock` statement, and the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class provide easier alternatives.
trans-unit.target: 在一般情況下，C#`lock`陳述式，Visual Basic`SyncLock`陳述式，而<xref:System.Threading.Monitor>類別提供您更輕鬆的替代項目。

trans-unit.source: On a multiprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> obtains the very latest value written to a memory location by any processor.
trans-unit.target: 在多處理器系統上，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>取得最新的值由任意處理器寫入記憶體位置。

trans-unit.source: This might require flushing processor caches.
trans-unit.target: 這可能需要清除處理器快取。

trans-unit.source: Under normal circumstances, the C# `lock` statement, the Visual Basic `SyncLock` statement, and the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class provide easier alternatives.
trans-unit.target: 在一般情況下，C#`lock`陳述式，Visual Basic`SyncLock`陳述式，而<xref:System.Threading.Monitor>類別提供您更輕鬆的替代項目。

trans-unit.source: On a multiprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> obtains the very latest value written to a memory location by any processor.
trans-unit.target: 在多處理器系統上，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>取得最新的值由任意處理器寫入記憶體位置。

trans-unit.source: This might require flushing processor caches.
trans-unit.target: 這可能需要清除處理器快取。

trans-unit.source: Even on a uniprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> ensure that a value is read or written to memory, and not cached (for example, in a processor register).
trans-unit.target: 在單一處理器系統上，甚至<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>確保某值為讀取或寫入記憶體，並不會快取 （例如，在處理器暫存器）。

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can use them to synchronize access to a field that can be updated by another thread, or by hardware.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以使用它們來進行同步存取另一個執行緒，或硬體可更新的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method affects only a single memory access.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法只會影響單一記憶體存取。

trans-unit.source: To provide effective synchronization for a field, all access to the field must use <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供有效欄位的同步處理，必須使用欄位的所有存取<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In C#, using the `volatile` modifier on a field guarantees that all access to that field uses <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，使用`volatile`欄位修飾詞可確保所有存取該欄位會都使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The field to be read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: 讀取欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The value is the latest written by any processor in a computer, regardless of the number of processors or the state of processor cache.
trans-unit.target: 值是由電腦中的任意處理器最新寫入的，與處理器的數目或處理器快取的狀態無關。

trans-unit.source: The latest value written to the field by any processor.
trans-unit.target: 由任意處理器寫入欄位的最新值。

trans-unit.target: 要寫入值的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The value to be written.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的值。

trans-unit.source: Writes a value to a field immediately, so that the value is visible to all processors in the computer.
trans-unit.target: 立即將值寫入欄位，讓電腦中的所有處理器都可以看到這個值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> are for special cases of synchronization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> 和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>會同步處理的特殊案例。

trans-unit.source: Under normal circumstances, the C# `lock` statement, the Visual Basic `SyncLock` statement, and the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class provide easier alternatives.
trans-unit.target: 在一般情況下，C#`lock`陳述式，Visual Basic`SyncLock`陳述式，而<xref:System.Threading.Monitor>類別提供您更輕鬆的替代項目。

trans-unit.source: On a multiprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> ensures that a value written to a memory location is immediately visible to all processors.
trans-unit.target: 在多處理器系統上，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>可確保寫入記憶體位置的值就會立即顯示所有處理器。

trans-unit.source: This might require flushing processor caches.
trans-unit.target: 這可能需要清除處理器快取。

trans-unit.source: Even on a uniprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> ensure that a value is read or written to memory, and not cached (for example, in a processor register).
trans-unit.target: 在單一處理器系統上，甚至<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>確保某值為讀取或寫入記憶體，並不會快取 （例如，在處理器暫存器）。

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can use them to synchronize access to a field that can be updated by another thread, or by hardware.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以使用它們來進行同步存取另一個執行緒，或硬體可更新的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method affects only a single memory access.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法只會影響單一記憶體存取。

trans-unit.source: To provide effective synchronization for a field, all access to the field must use <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供有效欄位的同步處理，必須使用欄位的所有存取<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In C#, using the `volatile` modifier on a field guarantees that all access to that field uses <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，使用`volatile`欄位修飾詞可確保所有存取該欄位會都使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 要寫入值的欄位。

trans-unit.target: 要寫入的值。

trans-unit.target: 要寫入值的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The value to be written.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的值。

trans-unit.source: Writes a value to a field immediately, so that the value is visible to all processors in the computer.
trans-unit.target: 立即將值寫入欄位，讓電腦中的所有處理器都可以看到這個值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> are for special cases of synchronization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> 和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>會同步處理的特殊案例。

trans-unit.source: Under normal circumstances, the C# `lock` statement, the Visual Basic `SyncLock` statement, and the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class provide easier alternatives.
trans-unit.target: 在一般情況下，C#`lock`陳述式，Visual Basic`SyncLock`陳述式，而<xref:System.Threading.Monitor>類別提供您更輕鬆的替代項目。

trans-unit.source: On a multiprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> ensures that a value written to a memory location is immediately visible to all processors.
trans-unit.target: 在多處理器系統上，<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>可確保寫入記憶體位置的值就會立即顯示所有處理器。

trans-unit.source: This might require flushing processor caches.
trans-unit.target: 這可能需要清除處理器快取。

trans-unit.source: Even on a uniprocessor system, <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A> ensure that a value is read or written to memory, and not cached (for example, in a processor register).
trans-unit.target: 在單一處理器系統上，甚至<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>確保某值為讀取或寫入記憶體，並不會快取 （例如，在處理器暫存器）。

trans-unit.source: Thus, you can use them to synchronize access to a field that can be updated by another thread, or by hardware.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以使用它們來進行同步存取另一個執行緒，或硬體可更新的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method affects only a single memory access.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法只會影響單一記憶體存取。

trans-unit.source: To provide effective synchronization for a field, all access to the field must use <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供有效欄位的同步處理，必須使用欄位的所有存取<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In C#, using the `volatile` modifier on a field guarantees that all access to that field uses <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，使用`volatile`欄位修飾詞可確保所有存取該欄位會都使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，使用`volatile`欄位修飾詞可確保所有存取該欄位會都使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileRead%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Thread.VolatileWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Causes the calling thread to yield execution to another thread that is ready to run on the current processor.
trans-unit.target: 造成呼叫執行緒執行目前處理器上已就緒可執行的其他執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The operating system selects the thread to yield to.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統會選擇要執行的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operating system switched execution to another thread; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統切換為執行其他執行緒，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this method succeeds, the rest of the thread's current time slice is yielded.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，會產生其他執行緒的目前時間配量。

trans-unit.source: The operating system schedules the calling thread for another time slice, according to its priority and the status of other threads that are available to run.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統排程呼叫執行緒的另一個時間配量，根據其優先順序和可執行其他執行緒的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Yielding is limited to the processor that is executing the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 產生僅限於用來執行呼叫執行緒的處理器。

trans-unit.source: The operating system will not switch execution to another processor, even if that processor is idle or is running a thread of lower priority.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不會切換執行為另一個處理器，即使該處理器處於閒置狀態，或正在執行較低優先權的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: If there are no other threads that are ready to execute on the current processor, the operating system does not yield execution, and this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有其他準備好要執行目前處理器上的執行緒、 作業系統並不會執行，產生和這個方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to using platform invoke to call the native Win32 `SwitchToThread` function.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於使用平台叫用呼叫原生 Win32`SwitchToThread`函式。

trans-unit.source: You should call the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Yield%2A> method instead of using platform invoke, because platform invoke bypasses any custom threading behavior the host has requested.
trans-unit.target: 您應該呼叫<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Yield%2A>方法，而不要使用平台叫用，因為平台叫用的任何自訂的執行緒行為主應用程式已要求略過。
